data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Epic Strings
data.detailed_description:
From mournful cello to intense violin and mysterious harp, there's something about string instruments that gives them a truly special sound.

Composed by Murray Atkinson from VGM Library, Epic Strings is a set of 14 music themes (and one bonus theme remastering) that covers a variety of orchestral themes. Inspired by the works of blockbusters like The Hobbit, Lord of the Rings, Star Wars and beyond, from imperial marches to medieval laments, themes for encounters with dragons, to adrenaline-inducing battles, this pack is a must have for every music enthusiast!

This pack contains:

  • 14 unique music themes.
  • Music for battle, horror, drama, laments, imperial marches, adventure, exploration and more
  • ..wav, .ogg, and .mp3 formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects.

Check out our other Music Packs created by Murray Atkinson:

Wonderland Music Pack
Medieval Warfare Music Pack
Heaven and Earth Music Pack
The Agency Music Pack
Rebel Rapture Music Pack
Heist Music Pack
Emporium of Copper and Steel Music Pack
Sinister Hollows Music Pack
Classic Fantasy Music Pack

store.steampowered.com/app/525284/RPG_Maker_MV__Epic_Strings/

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
